ygData.subject: Re: ROBES
ygData.msgSnippet: Apprentice robes cannot be trade or sold.  hence, your friend in another town cannot buy a robe for you and pass it along.  nor can apprentice robes be picked
ygData.messageBody:
Apprentice robes cannot be trade or sold. hence, your friend in another town
cannot buy a robe for you and pass it along. nor can apprentice robes be picked
up from your corpse by someone who has consent to loot it. that robe is yours,
through and through.





l.com>

Isn't the robe just anoher piece of clothing???? You should be able to
trade and/or buy them anywhere from anyone . . .

1 other thing . . . is the trip to Euridine from FREEPORT dangerous?? If I
stay on the road??

-Mata 9th lvl High Elf Wizard (Eci)
